com.codename1.webrtc

Class RTCPeerConnection.RTCOfferOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codename1.webrtc.RTCPeerConnection.RTCOfferOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JSONStruct
    Enclosing interface:
    RTCPeerConnection

    public static class RTCPeerConnection.RTCOfferOptions
extends Object
implements JSONStruct

    The RTCOfferOptions dictionary is used to provide optional settings when creating an RTCPeerConnection offer with the createOffer() method.

    See Also:
    https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/RTCOfferOptions

      RTCPeerConnection.RTCOfferOptions iceRestart(Boolean iceRestart) 
      Boolean isIceRestart()
      A Boolean which, when set to true, tells createOffer() to generate and use new values for the identifying properties of the SDP it creates, resulting in a request that triggers renegotiation of the ICE connection.

    • Method Detail

      • isIceRestart

        public Boolean isIceRestart()

        A Boolean which, when set to true, tells createOffer() to generate and use new values for the identifying properties of the SDP it creates, resulting in a request that triggers renegotiation of the ICE connection. This is useful if network conditions have changed in a way that make the current configuration untenable or impractical, for instance.

        Returns:
        the iceRestart

      • setIceRestart

        public void setIceRestart(Boolean iceRestart)
        Parameters:
        iceRestart - the iceRestart to set
